title: Cops Recruiting With AI? Aaliyah Conspiracy Theories? 8.6.21
itunes:title: Cops Recruiting With AI? Aaliyah Conspiracy Theories? 8.6.21
description:
In episode 964, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian Ever Mainard to discuss Ron DeSantis yelling at Joe Biden, Fox and Friends fighting over the vaccine, police having a hard time recruiting, new book on Aaliyah unveils a new rumor, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Ron DeSantis yells at Joe Biden for not being his real dad
  2. Fox and Friends now fighting over the vaccine
  3. Police are having a hard time recruiting so they are turning to THE ALGORITHM
  4. New book claims Aaliyah was drugged before being put on that fatal flight 
  5. Listen: FEDE - Trappeto Balcony
  6. Talks: The Joy To Do What Helps Us ♡ With Pema Chödrön
  7. Talks: The Noble Journey From Fear to Fearlessness ♡ Pema Chödrön

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
